name: Galaxy Shooter 2D (otacon90)
description:
The objective of the game is to survive the waves of enemies and defeat the mothership without dying. Collect power-ups to help you in your adventure.

Game created during the first course of GamedevHQ 

Controls - keyboard

  • WASD or arrow to move 
  • Spacebar to shot 
  • C key to attract power-ups
  • Shift to use the thruster
